name: Magic Guitar Free
description:
- Magic Guitar Free is the most music game and the only music rhythm game that you can play with your own music!
- You can play your favorite music inspired by the falling notes on the screen.
- This app provides you a note of accurate beat and good feeling hit.
- You can play with the preload songs or your local music files by your favorite artists.
- This app includes a brand new visual experience with beautiful lighting effects and animations.
- You can choose 3 difficulty levels (easy, normal, hard).
Features:
- Support local MP3 music files.
- Visually striking user interface.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Try this incredible game that will keep you entertained for a long time!
